Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.name: applyMagicConstrains()
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.abstract: Create all related NSLayoutConstraint for the view and all subviews in cascade mode

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.name: centerHorizontally(to:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.abstract: Create a magic constraint in order to center the view horizontally to super view

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.abstract: Create a magic constraint in order to center the view vertically to super view

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.name: center(to:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.abstract: Create a magic constraint in order to center the view vertically & horizontally to super view

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.name: matchWidth(toView:withPercentage:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.abstract: Create a magic constraint in order to match the view width to super view width

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.abstract: Create a magic constraint in order to match the view height & width to super view height & width

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.abstract: Create a magic constraint in order to pin last subview’s bottom side to view’s bottom side

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC11Ma.abstract: Create a magic constraint in order to pin first subview’s top side to view’s top side

Classes.html#/c:@M@MagicLayout@objc(cs)M.name: MLMagicViewController
